originalText.text: My daughter loves her! she went for a blow out and some a hair cut ( layers ) && we are in love with the results, the owner is a sweetheart and never fails us‚Ä¶come check her out you won‚Äôt regret it.

text.text: My daughter loves her! she went for a blow out and some a hair cut ( layers ) && we are in love with the results, the owner is a sweetheart and never fails us‚Ä¶come check her out you won‚Äôt regret it.

originalText.text: Called ahead of time to find out the price of a wash and set for long hair, was told it was 35 to 40 dollars. I came in and they find out my hair is naturally curly. Once everything was done the owner decides to charge me 60 dollars, stating wash and set is $45 now and my trim was $10 extra plus deep conditioning $5. Way too steep for just a wash and set, no matter what texture of hair it is. I feel like if I was Hispanic they would have charged alot less. The job once done was beautiful but because the owner( margarita) wanted to be greedy and charge me a arm and a leg, I couldn't even have enough left over to tip the worker who did my hair. Such a shame.

text.text: Called ahead of time to find out the price of a wash and set for long hair, was told it was 35 to 40 dollars. I came in and they find out my hair is naturally curly. Once everything was done the owner decides to charge me 60 dollars, stating wash and set is $45 now and my trim was $10 extra plus deep conditioning $5. Way too steep for just a wash and set, no matter what texture of hair it is. I feel like if I was Hispanic they would have charged alot less. The job once done was beautiful but because the owner( margarita) wanted to be greedy and charge me a arm and a leg, I couldn't even have enough left over to tip the worker who did my hair. Such a shame.

originalText.text:
UNSCRUPULOUS HAIR DRESSER
I went to this salon for a wash and set. After I left the place my hair was beautiful, but I noticed a terrible odor of rotten eggs. Could not understand why? This woman ( the blond washing my hair) had the audacity to put hair straighten in the shampoo she used to wash my natural curly hair without my knowledge or consent. If you are a natural curly hair person you know how devastating this could be to the process of going natural. They both knew what they were doing and did it deliberately. I could see their mischievous look among them but did not understand it since it was my first day in that place. Why they did it? I have no idea.Later I learned some hair dressers don't want to go through the hassle of straightening a natural curly hair with the blower. Now my hair is dry and breaking. All the work that I had put on my hair for months went down the drain. I feel I should take them to court. Who they think they are to do this to people?  Be aware of unscrupulous people out there.  Ask questions.  Take your own products. Don't let people touch your hair, unless you really know who they are.
